G

game - package game
 
GameBoard - Class in game
In a newly created game, an instance of the GameBoard class is created in which the deck of cards is created and a winner of the game is determined by creating and running instances of the Round class until one player has won.
GameBoard(GameController) - Constructor for class game.GameBoard
the constructor which sets the gameController
GameController - Class in game
The GameController mainly handles the communication between the chat and the game.
GameController(ChatServer) - Constructor for class game.GameController
Constructor for the GameController.
getActivePlayers() - Method in class game.Round
Gets the active players in the round.
getActiveRound() - Method in class game.GameBoard
it returns the active round
getCard() - Method in class game.Player
Getter for the current card of player.
getCardDeck() - Method in class game.Round

getFirstCardRemoved() - Method in class game.Round
Gets the first card from the deck, which is removed.
getLastDate() - Method in class server.User
Gets the date when the user was most recently on a date.
getName() - Method in class server.User
Gets the name of the user.
getPlayedCards() - Method in class game.Player

getPlayerCount() - Method in class game.GameBoard

getRoundWinner() - Method in class game.Round

getScorePlayer(User) - Method in class game.GameBoard

getSumPlayedCards() - Method in class game.Player
Adds up the card values of the discarded cards.
